channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can I Drink Electrolyte Water Every Day? Experts Weigh In (2025)
item.description: Electrolyte beverages are all the rage—but should you be consuming them in the first place, and if so, how often? Experts weigh in.

item.title: Cohere hires long-time Meta research head Joelle Pineau as its chief AI officer
item.description: Cohere has hired Joelle Pineau, Meta's former VP of AI research who previously oversaw the tech giant's fundamental AI research (FAIR) lab. In her new...

item.title: REI Co-op Base Camp 6 Review: All-Weather, All-Season Family Tent
item.description: REI’s Base Camp is a sturdy, well-designed, well-built six-person tent to keep your family dry in the great outdoors.

item.title: Google pushes AI into flight deals as antitrust scrutiny, competition heat up
item.description: Google has launched Flight Deals as its AI tool within Google Flights to help travelers find cheaper fares.

item.title: Apple’s blood oxygen monitoring returns to its latest Apple Watches
item.description: The change doesn’t affect previously sold models with the original version of the feature or units bought outside the U.S.

item.title: AI translation tech Palabra gets backing from Reddit co-founder’s venture firm
item.description: Alexis Ohanian and his firm Seven Seven Six are backing Palabra, which is working on a translation engine.

item.title: 44 Must-Have Back-to-School College Dorm Room Essentials and Gear (2025)
item.description: Deck out your room and make class a cinch with these WIRED-tested favorites.

item.title: Senators Press Howard Lutnick’s Former Investment Firm Over Tariff Conflict of Interest Concerns
item.description: Senators Ron Wyden and Elizabeth Warren are demanding answers from Cantor Fitzgerald after WIRED reported that the firm was essentially creating a way...

item.title: LG B5 OLED Review: Subtle Luxury
item.description: LG’s B5 is another great value contender, but is it the best OLED for your dollars?

item.title: Inside the Box: Aaron Levie on reinvention at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Aaron Levie of Box joins the Disrupt Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 in October.
